summary: This document is an email from Ghislaine Maxwell's legal team to prison officials (Bureau of Prisons ID 02879-509) complaining about new, allegedly arbitrary restrictions imposed on Maxwell's clothing and hygiene requirements while in detention. The email requests copies of the regulations justifying these new rules.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the email from her legal team, which details new restrictions on her clothing and hygiene requirements while in pre-trial detention.

events.title: Legal complaint about detention conditions
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell's legal team sends an email to prison officials formally complaining about new, sudden restrictions on Maxwell's clothing and hygiene requirements, which they claim are not referenced in the official handbook.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell's legal team filed a formal complaint about her detention conditions on January 11, 2021.
New restrictions were imposed requiring Maxwell to wear a sports bra at all times, prohibiting specific clothing combinations, and mandating specific shower cleaning procedures.
The shower cleaning instruction was reportedly conducted without the handheld camera present.
The legal team asserts these requirements are not found in the official A&O (Admissions and Orientation) Handbook and requests the relevant regulations.
The correspondence shows Maxwell had been wearing the same outfit throughout her detention without prior objection from authorities.
